content:
爱丁堡第二天
今天是自由行 于是我很dlj十点吃早餐 十二点出门 找了小红书爆款打卡点(图二) 阴天 发现也没多好看 再去卡尔顿山 后面实在不知道去哪了 太无聊了 就各种找活动 去ktv 下午有很多也没开 于是我们就回酒店这边吃烤鱼 因为上次在那里吃的兰州拉面很可以 这次烤鱼也很可以 然后想着买扑克牌玩 结果去了个中超 老板说送我们 我不太好意思 消费了一盒魔芋爽 回来的路上路过爱丁堡大学 就浅看了下
晚上七点 我们跟我们专业的三个男的去ktv 结果他们都是玩游戏的宅男 震惊 因为他们看着就是经常混外面的人 后面就玩游戏 把我跟我课友都喝的晕晕乎乎 回了酒店 往床上一躺就睡着了
凌晨一点 广东人每天洗澡的血脉把我直接惊醒 晕晕乎乎去卸了个妆 去了个厕所 觉得太难受了 就硬吐 吐完整个人重生 就去洗澡睡觉了

account.note:
开心快乐每一天
*废话小天地

Don Knuth letter about libraries increasingly unable to afford prices [pdf]

- 45 minutes ago | 6 points | 2 comments
- URL: https://cs.stanford.edu/~knuth/joalet.pdf
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39740922
- Summary: This text appears to be a mixture of different programming language code snippets and permissions listing. It declares variables, imports modules, defines functions, and sets up certain permissions for reading and writing to various file paths. The code snippets are written in a syntax that is reminiscent of Lua and seem to be executed in the context of a Chatbot or Bot framework, possibly Discord.js or similar. However, without more context, it's impossible to provide a specific summary.

content:
Apple Is in Talks to Let Google's Gemini Power iPhone Generative AI Features
----
- an hour ago | 27 points | 31 comments
- URL: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-03-18/apple-in-talks-to-license-google-gemini-for-iphone-ios-18-generative-ai-tools
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39740731
- Summary: Apple is reportedly in talks with Google to license its Gemini AI engine for new generative AI features on the iPhone as part of iOS 18. The deal would build on their existing search partnership and give Gemini access to potentially billions of users. Apple has also discussed partnering with OpenAI, but a deal isn't imminent. A partnership would expand Google's reach and potentially face regulatory scrutiny.

account.note: Hacker News top 10 in every 10 minutes.

card.title: Apple in Talks to License Google Gemini for iPhone, iOS 18 Generative AI Tools
card.description: Apple Inc. is in talks to build Google’s Gemini artificial intelligence engine into the iPhone, according to people familiar with the situation, setting the stage for a blockbuster agreement that would shake up the AI industry.

content:
时常想起电影《青蛇》里的一段台词：你总是说人间有情，可是你有没有想过，我们五百年相处也是情?你有没有把我当人看过?
引用这句话是因为我突然发现墙内的粉红，反贼，女权……他们统统不爱具体的人，他们爱的是嘴里的那套主义。他们只说人间有情，却从来没有把人当人看过。

account.note: 没有原创嘟文，零关注度的新号过来关注我的，一律会被我屏蔽，请谨慎关注。

content:
Bats of the Midnight Sun
----
- 41 minutes ago | 3 points | 0 comments
- URL: https://hakaimagazine.com/features/bats-of-the-midnight-sun/
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39740607
- Summary: A bat study, led by chiropterologist Jesika Reimer, is being conducted in Alaska to determine where little brown bats hibernate, as their behavior in the Arctic summer and winter remains a mystery. This unique population, which shares traits with brown bears such as slow reproduction and hibernation, could provide insights on how they avoid white-nose syndrome, a disease decimating bat populations in North America. The study involves capturing and tagging bats for genetic analysis to determine population connectivity and hibernation locations.

account.note: Hacker News top 10 in every 10 minutes.

card.title: Bats of the Midnight Sun | Hakai Magazine
card.description: Active in daylight during the Arctic summer and hibernating during the long winter nights, Alaska’s little brown bats are a unique population. Can their niche lives help them avoid white-nose syndrome?

content:
看一个算命大师的微博。普通人的命格，真是千奇百怪，就是这儿有一点优点，那儿又有一点瑕疵给克没了
看得我心灰意冷的
